law.catch_line: Kentucky Special Education Mentor Program -- Criteria.
law.history: Created 1998 Ky. Acts ch. 514, sec. 3, effective July 15, 1998.

metadata.lrc-note: (7/15/98). Although 1998 Ky. Acts ch. 514, sec. 3, contained a citation to "Section 5 of [the] Act" (codified at KRS 157.200), it is clear from context that Section 6 (codified at KRS 157.224) was intended. This latter reference has been used for codification under KRS 7.136(1)(h).
